roleset.name: talk to god
roleset.note: PRAY-V NOTES: Why does he assume the demon speaks Latin? (from pray.01-v)

example.name: intransitive
example.text: [Father McKenna]-1 moves through the house *trace*-1 praying in Latin, urging the demon to split.

example.name: pray for
example.text: When I realized it was over, I-1 went and stood out in front of the house, *trace*-1 waiting and praying for Merrill to come home, shivering as if it were 20 below zero until he got there.

example.name: with arg2
example.text: John prays daily to the ancient gods of his people: Santa Claus and Elvis.
example.arg: to the ancient gods of his people: Santa Claus and Elvis.
